item.title: Enrolled at Xi’an Jiaotong University.
item.description: With great anticipation, I have officially enrolled in the School of Mathematics and Statistics at Xi’an Jiaotong University to pursue a Master’s degree in Applied Statistics. Under the supervision of Professor Jia Liu, my research will focus on trajectory optimization. I look forward to the next three years of academic growth, research exploration, and personal development.

item.title: Graduated with a Bachelor's degree.
item.description: I graduated today from the School of Mathematical Sciences at the University of Electronic Science and Technology of China, with a Bachelor of Science in Data Science and Big Data Technology. I am deeply grateful for the excellent education I received, the insightful professors I learned from, and the brilliant friends I met along the way. Though the mountains are high and the road long — we will meet again.
